revised_title: Researches in Physical Astronomy: Continued - Analyzing the Disturbing Function
tldr: The author continues his research in physical astronomy, focusing on the development of the disturbing function in celestial mechanics. He presents a method for expressing the coefficients of the inequalities corresponding to a given order in terms of the coefficients of the inferior orders, which can be used to analyze the effects of planetary perturbations on the motion of celestial bodies.
